title: Film Portrait Nasrin Sotoudeh Martin Ennals Award 2012

sources.title: Film Portrait Nasrin Sotoudeh Martin Ennals Award 2012
sources.description: Film Portrait Nasrin Sotoudeh Martin Ennals Award 2012 Nasrin Sotoudeh, from Iran, was nominated for the Martin Ennals Award 2012 alongside the Venerable Luon Sovath (Cambodia) and the Bahrain Center for Human Rights.
